item.description:
How about a meetup to Fishers on Thursday July 1 (also known as Canada Day....eh).

We'll do a late afternoon flyout, Bill and Sheila would be there to shuttle people to their house there and we could do burgers, dogs, sausage etc hey, er, ya know.

We should bring some salads, etc as getting loads of food to the island has its challenges, so airplanes are a good way to do it!!

The Taylors have gratiously also offered to pick up the cost of the landing fee, $8 per single, as a gesture of invitation to come see their little bit of paradise.
"an intro to Fishers Island" Great little airport with a fun approach. The island is a hidden gem.

This is a great way to kick off the weekend! Did someone say
"The Taylor's First Annual Fishers Island Canada Day Celebration, eh"?

RSVP for this one. Rent, Borrow, or...er...whatever... But don't miss this one.. It's a short hop and a fun one! ... Rain date for the following day, Friday July 2.

http://www.navmonster...


Thanks Bill and Sheila!

Charley
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet you at Elizabeth Airfield and transport you to our house ph: 631-788-7106

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fishers Island , Canada Day, with the Taylors...eh
